questions.question: Considering the overall design, what best describes the visual layout of this food product's nutritional information?

Looking at the label's text, what kind of information is primarily presented in bold typeface?
What is the general appearance and visual style of the text blocks on the label?

Considering the text's visual characteristics, what could you describe the overall visual weight of the text as?
